productionSqlExpression: SELECT SUM(total_amount) AS sales_m12 FROM invoice_hdr WHERE invoice_date >= DATEFROMPARTS(YEAR(DATEADD(month, -12, GETDATE())), MONTH(DATEADD(month, -12, GETDATE())), 1)  AND invoice_date <  DATEFROMPARTS(YEAR(DATEADD(month, -11, GETDATE())), MONTH(DATEADD(month, -11, GETDATE())), 1);
calculationType: Count system activities for the appropriate calendar month.

productionSqlExpression: SELECT COUNT(*) AS result FROM rental_history WHERE created_date BETWEEN DATEADD(month, -11, DATEADD(month, DATEDIFF(month, 0, GETDATE()), 0)) AND DATEADD(month, -10, DATEADD(month, DATEDIFF(month, 0, GETDATE()), 0)) - 1;
calculationType: Count rental activities for the appropriate calendar month.
